text:
Has Shia Labeouf actually been hitting on Dakota Johnson while filming their upcoming movie? That’s the claim in one of this week’s new tabloids, but Gossip Cop has the truth. According to Ok!, the married actor is “flirting up a storm” with his co-star on the Georgia set of the indie drama, The Peanut Butter […]
